pages.text: After priming yourself on $(l:conjuring:basics/basic_gem_tinkering)Basic Gem Tinkering$() you might be able to realize the gem tinkerers $(o)full potential$().$(br)Once you have aquired some $(item)Soul Tools$() you can infuse them with the aspect gems.$(br)There is a limit to this power however. You are only able to put two different types on a single tool, and there is only enough space for 5 gems to fit on it.
